name: Token Life
description:
A life-in-a-box simulator built for LD44 (theme: "your life is currency"). Full screen is recommended.

Your energy and education are resources; spend them wisely. Allocate your assets, grow your legacy over multiple generations, and one day your descendants will ascend the throne to become emperor.

Font used: CAC Champagne courtesy of https://www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/CAC-Champagne
